meanings.definition: A test or record of brain activity obtained by measuring electrical activity in the brain.
meanings.sent1: The doctor recommended an electroencephalogram to check my brain activity.
meanings.sent2: The hospital uses an electroencephalogram to monitor brain waves.
meanings.sent3: During the electroencephalogram, my brain seemed to be dancing to its own electric tune.
meanings.sent4: The electroencephalogram revealed a storm of electrical signals in my brain.
meanings.sent5: The electroencephalogram was like a lightning map of my thoughts.

meanings.definition: The process of recording brain waves using electrodes placed on the scalp.
meanings.sent1: After the accident, the doctor performed an electroencephalogram to study my brain waves.
meanings.sent2: The neurologist explained the procedure of an electroencephalogram to the patient.
meanings.sent3: During the electroencephalogram, I felt like a human science experiment with wires on my head.
meanings.sent4: The electroencephalogram turned my brain waves into a colorful pattern on the screen.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the electroencephalogram machine was like a gentle rain on my scalp.
